quote_first: I am sorry, therefore, as I have said, that I ever paid any attention to the footsteps. They began about a
quote_last: o’clock in the morning, a rhythmic, quick-cadenced walking around the dining-room table.
title: My Life and Hard Times: "The Night the Ghost Got In"
author: James Thurber

quote_first: Lily Chen always prepared an ‘evening’ snack for her husband to consume on his return at
title: Sour Sweet
author: Timothy Mo
